stories.title: Edward Snowden Was the Unknown 6th Person Who Launched ZCash

stories.text: I'm building this "Google Maps of time". It is an interactive timeline for historians. It has seamless zoom from Yottayears to zeptoseconds. This timespan can fit prety much anything an astrophysicist needs. The software is able to display "normal" historical events, anything at human-history scale (think years, days). Also, super-fast events, like a lightning strike.
stories.title: Show HN: New “Google Maps of Time” Zooms from Yottayears to Zeptoseconds
A Philosophy of Software Design – Book Summary and Notes

stories.text:
I started to work on a weekly curated selection of interesting jobs in Berlin. Even if you are not currently searching, being informed about the job market should help. I also include short snippets about startup latest funding rounds in continental Europe and other interesting stuff.

It’s a free (and freshly started) Substack and I would love your feedback.

https://handpickedberlin.substack.com/p/issue1?s=w
stories.title: Show HN: Handpicked job openings in Berlin (Substack)
